p: The flower heads of Chrysanthemum morifolium Ramat. and C. indicum L. (family Asteraceae) were commercially obtained from China. DNA barcoding technique was used to authenticate the plants and it was confirmed morphologically at the Botanical Garden, Heidelberg University. The flower materials are stored at the Department of Biology, IPMB, Heidelberg University under the numbers of P6851 and P6852, respectively.
